message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
You didn't take my first offer, this one is a bit steeper
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but we need to make progress. Let's split it closer to even.
Time is on my side, you're losing value every round
We're getting closer to the end. I'm willing to give you a bit more to avoid getting nothing at all.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous
This is my final offer.  It's not ideal, but it's better than nothing for both of us.  Let's make a deal before it's too late.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a good deal
This is my absolute final offer. I'm taking a big loss here, but it's the only way to salvage anything.  Accept it, or we both get nothing.
I'm not backing down, you're running out of options
This is it, Alice.  I'm giving you as much as I can.  We're both going to lose a lot if we don't agree now.
